fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
- Research, technology and education initiatives in General, currently e.g. The EU Framework Programme for Research and Innovation Horizon 2020. 
- Specific interest in the coming up quantum technology flagship
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Development, manufacturing and sales of lasers and laser-based systems and quantum technology instruments for industrial applications and fundamental research.
relevant_communication:
- Participation in meetings of industry and academia related to quantum technology. 
- Sponsoring of and participation in quantum technology-related conferences and workshops 
- published articles and commentaries on topics like quantum optics' route to market in four journals: Nature Physics, Physikalische Blätter, Spektrum der Wissenschaft, Spektrum der Wissenschaft Spezial - Physik / Mathematik / Technik
